languages.text: Возрадовалися люди веры, что бысти им теперь под опекой надежной и сильной, и возгласили о том прегромко.
And the faithful rejoiced, for henceforth they would have an unwavering and mighty guardian; and they proclaimed it for all to hear.
languages.original_text: Возрадовалися люди веры, что бысти им теперь под опекой надежной и сильной, и возгласили о том прегромко.

traits.locale_text: And the faithful rejoiced, for henceforth they would have an unwavering and mighty guardian; and they proclaimed it for all to hear.
And the faithful rejoiced, for henceforth they would have an unwavering and mighty guardian; and they proclaimed it for all to hear.
And the faithful rejoiced, for henceforth they would have an unwavering and mighty guardian; and they proclaimed it for all to hear.
And the faithful rejoiced, for henceforth they would have an unwavering and mighty guardian; and they proclaimed it for all to hear.
And the faithful rejoiced, for henceforth they would have an unwavering and mighty guardian; and they proclaimed it for all to hear.

languages.text: Y los fieles se regocijaron, pues desde aquel momento tendrían a un{mf||a} poderos{mf|o|a} guardi{mf|án|ana}. Lo proclamaron a los cuatro vientos.
languages.original_text: And the faithful rejoiced, for henceforth they would have an unwavering and mighty guardian; and they proclaimed it for all to hear.

traits.locale_text: Y los fieles se regocijaron, pues desde aquel momento tendrían a un{mf||a} poderos{mf|o|a} guardi{mf|án|ana}. Lo proclamaron a los cuatro vientos.

languages.text: 修士们欣喜若狂，因此从这一刻起，他们拥有了一位强大的、坚定不移的庇护主。他们向所有人宣告了这一点。
languages.original_text: And the faithful rejoiced, for henceforth they would have an unwavering and mighty guardian; and they proclaimed it for all to hear.

traits.locale_text: 修士们欣喜若狂，因此从这一刻起，他们拥有了一位强大的、坚定不移的庇护主。他们向所有人宣告了这一点。

languages.text: そして信者は、これより揺るぎない力を持つ守護者を得たことに歓喜した。すべての者よ聞けと、その事実を堂々と宣言した。
languages.original_text: And the faithful rejoiced, for henceforth they would have an unwavering and mighty guardian; and they proclaimed it for all to hear.

traits.locale_text: そして信者は、これより揺るぎない力を持つ守護者を得たことに歓喜した。すべての者よ聞けと、その事実を堂々と宣言した。

languages.text: Und die Gläubigen jubelten, denn von nun an würden sei {mf|einen unbeugsamen und mächtigen Wächter|eine unbeugsame und mächtige Wächterin} haben, und das verkündeten sie, auf dass es alle hörten.
languages.original_text: And the faithful rejoiced, for henceforth they would have an unwavering and mighty guardian; and they proclaimed it for all to hear.

traits.locale_text: Und die Gläubigen jubelten, denn von nun an würden sei {mf|einen unbeugsamen und mächtigen Wächter|eine unbeugsame und mächtige Wächterin} haben, und das verkündeten sie, auf dass es alle hörten.

languages.text: Le cœur en joie, les fidèles proclament haut et fort qu'ils bénéficient désormais de la protection d'{mf|un|une} {mf|gardien|gardienne} inébranlable.
languages.original_text: And the faithful rejoiced, for henceforth they would have an unwavering and mighty guardian; and they proclaimed it for all to hear.

traits.locale_text: Le cœur en joie, les fidèles proclament haut et fort qu'ils bénéficent désormais de la protection d'{mf|un|une} {mf|gardien|gardienne} inébranlable.

languages.text: İnançlılar sevinç içindeydi çünkü o andan itibaren sarsılmaz ve kudretli bir hamileri olacaktı. Onu benimsediler ve benimsediklerini herkese duyurdular.
languages.original_text: And the faithful rejoiced, for henceforth they would have an unwavering and mighty guardian; and they proclaimed it for all to hear.

traits.locale_text: İnançlılar sevinç içindeydi çünkü o andan itibaren sarsılmaz ve kudretli bir hamileri olacaktı. Onu benimsediler ve benimsediklerini herkese duyurdular.
